post.text:
We are better than bigotry, fear, and hate.

Share this if you agree. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Michaela
comment.text: America America America!!! Because of you the world has been able to have United nation, because of you the world have been able to fight bad terrorist in some of the Islamic counties, in science & technology you are pretty there, doing your best to bring peace in the world, I can start counting it cuz is uncountable but I most let you know something big is about to happen if you don't rise up to your true meaning.' a man named Donald trump is coming to disagree on everything you agree, please American stop him, stop him, stop him cuz he doesn't have the temperament to lead the world, stop him cuz Putin is going to use him to put the world @nuclear risk, he is in love with Putin which will make him Putin servant, please the world need your help to vote him down & kindly vote Madam president Hillary Clinton up up up to the higher level, thank you as you grant my request.

replies.author: Alicia
replies.text: Very powerful, very moving, I want you to know that I am doing all I can my friend. The world is bad enough now, god help us If he gets elected
